thread.title_full: Ground News - Siberian Lawmaker, Former Navalny Associate To Be Sentenced On Extremism Charge

author: Radio Free Europe/ RadioLiberty
title: Ground News - Siberian Lawmaker, Former Navalny Associate To Be Sentenced On Extremism Charge
text:
Summary by Radio Free Europe/ RadioLiberty A court in the Siberian city of Tomsk announced it will sentence Ksenia Fadeyeva, a local lawmaker and the former head of jailed opposition leader Aleksei Navalny's regional team, on December 29. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Radio Free Europe/ RadioLiberty Center Mixed Factuality Siberian Lawmaker, Former Navalny Associate To Be Sentenced On Extremism Charge A court in the Siberian city of Tomsk announced it will sentence Ksenia Fadeyeva, a local lawmaker and the former head of jailed opposition leader Aleksei Navalny's regional team, on December 29.
